# Artifactory Trash Can Config Resource

Provides an Artifactory Trash Can configuration resource. This can be used to create and manage Artifactory trash can configuration.

This resource configuration corresponds to `trashcanConfig` config block in system configuration XML
(REST endpoint: [artifactory/api/system/configuration](https://www.jfrog.com/confluence/display/JFROG/Artifactory+REST+API#ArtifactoryRESTAPI-GeneralConfiguration)).

When enabled, deleted items are stored in the trash can for the specified retention period before being permanently deleted.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "artifactory_trashcan_config" "my-trash-can-config" {
  enabled               = true
  retention_period_days = 14
}
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `enabled` - (Optional) If set, trash can will be enabled and deleted items will be stored in the trash can for the specified retention period. Defaults to `true`.
* `retention_period_days` - (Optional) The number of days to keep deleted items in the trash can before deleting permanently. Defaults to `14`.

## Import

Current Trash Can configuration can be imported using any arbitrary value as the `ID`, e.g.

```
$ terraform import artifactory_trashcan_config.my-trash-can-config my-trash-can-config
```
